sentences.en: A national poll shows the presidential race in a dead heat.
sentences.cn: 一项全国民意调查显示总统竞选相持不下。

sentences.en: Banks spent his national service in the Royal Navy.
sentences.cn: 班克斯在皇家海军服过兵役。

sentences.en: Between 1929 and 1933 America’s national income fell by more than half.
sentences.cn: 1929至1933年间，美国的国民收入下降过半。

sentences.en: Do you always have a bet on the Grand National?
sentences.cn: 你总是对全国赛马大会下点注吗？

sentences.en: Foreign nationals were advised to leave the country. ＃
sentences.cn: 外国侨民被劝离开该国。

sentences.en: He could read all the national papers at his leisure.
sentences.cn: 他可以悠然阅读所有的全国性报纸。

sentences.en: national and local newspapers
sentences.cn: 全国性的和地方的报纸

sentences.en: National Savings gross sales in June totalled £709 million.
sentences.cn: 6月份国民储蓄机构的总销售额为7.09亿英镑。

sentences.en: Religion matters very much at a national level.
sentences.cn: 宗教事务在全国都非常重要。

sentences.en: The call-up of National Guard and reserve units begun in late August.
sentences.cn: 国民警卫队和预备役的征兵工作8月下旬开始。

sentences.en: The causes are a complex blend of local and national tensions.
sentences.cn: 原因很复杂，既有地方性冲突也有全国范围的紧张局势。

sentences.en: The events in Los Angeles have sparked a new national self-examination.
sentences.cn: 发生在洛杉矶的事件再次引发了全国范围的反思。

sentences.en: The forces of National Socialism were transforming Germany root and branch.
sentences.cn: 纳粹主义势力当时正在彻底改变德国。

sentences.en: The main investor in the project is the French bank Credit National.
sentences.cn: 该项目的主要投资商是法国的国民信贷银行。

sentences.en: The mine reportedly had an accident rate triple the national average.
sentences.cn: 据报道，该矿事故发生率是全国平均水平的3倍。

sentences.en: The National Health Service has visibly deteriorated, despite increased spending.
sentences.cn: 尽管支出在增加，但国民医疗保健服务的质量却明显下降了。

sentences.en: The national health system saved him from becoming a cripple.
sentences.cn: 在国民医疗保健系统的救助下，他免于致残。

sentences.en: There are strong indications that the Prime Minister will call national elections in May.
sentences.cn: 有明显迹象预示首相将于5月召集全国大选。

sentences.en: These obscure groups were of little account in national politics.
sentences.cn: 这些名不见经传的团体在国内政界无足轻重。

sentences.en: They are afraid of losing their national identity.
sentences.cn: 他们担心会失去他们的民族特色。

sentences.en: We didn't understand how difficult it was to distribute a national paper.
sentences.cn: 我们不了解分销一份全国发行的报纸有多难。

words.tran_cn: 民族主义的（等于nationalistic）；国家主义的；民族独立主义的
本国的；土著的；天然的；与生俱来的；天赋的
全国性地；以国民立场地；举国一致地
民族主义；国家主义；民族特性
民族主义者；国家主义者；民族独立主义者
把…收归国有；使具有某国国籍；使成国家
使国有化；使民族化；使归化；使成国家
种族的,国家的;本国的;全国范围的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 国民医疗服务制度

trans.tran_en: related to a whole nation as opposed to any of its parts
someone who is a citizen of a particular country but is living in another country
related to a whole nation as opposed to any of its parts
